hero.desc: Uzbekistan's first-ever <br className='hidden xl:block' /> Olympic champion in judo

section.title:
I’m glad that I’m the first to bring an olympic gold medal to the history of uzbek judo.
I proved that women are capable of anything.

about: Olympic champion in Judo, Diyora Keldiyorova became a national hero in Uzbekistan on 28 July by winning the country`s first-ever Olympic judo gold in the -52kg category at Paris 2024. Beyond her impressive athletic achievements, including two World Championship silver medals, Keldiyorova embodies the Olympic values of excellence, friendship and respect. She is a role model, inspiring countless women and girls, showing them the power of determination and the possibilities that lie ahead.

socials.title: Special representative of the National Social Protection Agency
socials.desc: Ijtimoiy himoya milliy agentligining maxsus vakili Diyora Keldiyorova gender tengsizligi va bolalarga nisbatan zo❜ravonlik haqida xabardorlikni oshirish, siyosat islohotlarini targ❜ib qilish va ushbu muammolarni hal qilish uchun tashkilotlar bilan hamkorlik qilish uchun mas❜uldir. U ishlarni kuzatib boradi, siyosatchilarga tavsiyalar beradi va jabrlanuvchilarning asosiy yordam xizmatlaridan foydalanishini ta❜minlaydi, shu bilan birga  O❜zbekistonda yanada adolatli va adolatli jamiyatni ta❜minlaydi.
